subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Penguins center Sidney Crosby, who has missed 29 games after sustaining a concussion, returned to the ice Monday, but he was uncertain when he will play again.
snippet: Pittsburgh Penguins center Sidney Crosby, who has missed 29 games after sustaining a concussion, returned to the ice Monday, but he was uncertain when he will play again.
